Title: Analysis of cross-system porting and porting errors in software projects
Purpose: To build a deeper understanding of the extent and characteristic of cross-system porting and porting errors.
Elements_risk_assessment: pc could be not a BIC
UseOF-SZZ: They use the SZZ to identify the fix inducing changes
Summary: It presents tool support to monitor cross-system porting and to detect and diagnose potential porting errors.
Outcome: These tools should help managers and architects to make informed decisions on how to maintain forked projects and assist developers in detecting and diagnosing porting inconsistencies.
